org.finra.herd.rest

Class UserNamespaceAuthorizationRestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.finra.herd.rest.HerdBaseController
      • org.finra.herd.rest.UserNamespaceAuthorizationRestController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/rest",
                produces={"application/xml","application/json"})
public class UserNamespaceAuthorizationRestController
extends HerdBaseController
    The REST controller that handles user namespace authorization REST requests.

    • Method Detail

      • createUserNamespaceAuthorization

        @RequestMapping(value="/userNamespaceAuthorizations",
                method=POST,
                consumes={"application/xml","application/json"})
 @Secured(value="FN_USER_NAMESPACE_AUTHORIZATIONS_POST")
public UserNamespaceAuthorization createUserNamespaceAuthorization(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                UserNamespaceAuthorizationCreateRequest request)

        Creates a new user namespace authorization.

        The user ID field may be prefixed with a wildcard token character "*" to authorize multiple users access to the namespace. The wildcard only works for as a prefix to match the suffix of the user ID. If the wildcard appears anywhere other than the prefix, the user ID must match as-is. For example:

        • john.doe@domain.com - only authorizes user with ID "john.doe@domain.com"
        • *@domain.com - authorizes users that has the suffix "@domain.com"
        • * - authorizes all users
        • john.doe* - only authorizes user with ID "john.doe*"

        Requires GRANT permission on namespace

        Parameters:
        request - the information needed to create the user namespace authorization
        Returns:
        the created user namespace authorization

      • updateUserNamespaceAuthorization

        @RequestMapping(value="/userNamespaceAuthorizations/userIds/{userId}/namespaces/{namespace}",
                method=PUT,
                consumes={"application/xml","application/json"})
 @Secured(value="FN_USER_NAMESPACE_AUTHORIZATIONS_POST")
public UserNamespaceAuthorization updateUserNamespaceAuthorization(@PathVariable(value="userId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       String userId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       @PathVariable(value="namespace")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       String namespace,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       UserNamespaceAuthorizationUpdateRequest request)
        Updates an existing user namespace authorization by key.

        Requires GRANT permission on namespace

        Parameters:
        userId - the user id
        namespace - the namespace
        request - the information needed to update the user namespace authorization
        Returns:
        the updated user namespace authorization
